{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.03614v1", "title": "A self-adaptive subgradient extragradient method with conjugate
  gradient-type direction for pseudomonotone variational inequalities", "summary": "This paper introduces a subgradient extragradient algorithm with a conjugate
gradient-type direction to solve pseudomonotone variational inequality problems
in Hilbert spaces. The algorithm features a self-adaptive strategy that
eliminates the need for prior knowledge of the Lipschitz constant and
incorporate a conjugate gradient-type direction to enhance convergence speed.
We establish a result describing the behavior generated therefrom toward the
solution set. Using this result, we prove the strong convergence of the
proposed method and provide numerical experiments to demonstrate its
computational efficacy and robustness.", "main_category": "math.OC", "categories": "math.OC", "published": "2025-05-06T15:14:55Z"}
